field.name: child_ids

a.style: position: absolute; right: 0; padding: 4px; diplay: inline-block

t.t-if: record.has_image.raw_value === false and (!record.image or record.image.raw_value === false)

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a contact in your address book.
OpenERP helps you easily track all activities related to a customer; discussions, history of business opportunities, documents, etc.
